content:
Title: Software Engineer

Department: Marketing


Description:

As a Software Engineer in the Marketing department, you will develop, maintain, and enhance tools and applications that support marketing initiatives...


Responsibilities:

1. Design, develop, and implement software tools for marketing automation and data analysis. 2. Collaborate with the marketing and data teams to understand technical requirements...


Qualifications:

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field, with 3+ years of experience in software development...
